reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and perfect for night out events, appreciating its comfortable fit and stretchiness that complements body shape. Customers disagree on whether the dress runs true to size.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It beautiful and material is great
items.body: It fits good the material is great Read more
items.author: Naromie Hardy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Black Tie / Formal comfort
items.body: Stunning! I was worried about fabric quality since it was inexpensive for a formal black tie wedding option, but this was perfect. The material has a good amount of stretch, but maintains its shape well. The puffs on the sleeve laid more than the picture, but worked out nicely. It’s very much a bodycon dress that will hug every curve even with spanx but I got tons of compliments and was comfortable knowing I could breathe and dance without feeling so stuffy in an expensive gown. Typically wear 22w pants and 2x top 46C Read more
items.author: Bumblebee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ⭐⭐⭐⭐ Perfect fit and amazing quality for the price
items.body: I was honestly surprised by how good this dress turned out! For the price, I wasn’t expecting much — but it completely exceeded my expectations. The material is nice and thick (not see-through at all), and the cut is super flattering, especially if you’ve got curves. It hugs in all the right places without feeling tight or uncomfortable. I love that it has some stretch but still keeps its shape, and the fit makes it look way more expensive than it is. Perfect for a wedding or any other formal event. If you’re a thicker girl and struggle to find dresses that actually fit right without gaping or riding up, this one is a total win. I’d 100% buy it again in more colors! Read more
items.author: Wanda Diaz

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars This dress has been worn and I paid for a new dress.
items.body: I ordered 2 dresses. A red and black dress. Very pretty. I wore the red dress last night which had no tags on it. I have the black dress for today. Well I aww there is deodorant under the arm of the black dress and I don't appreciate being sent a used dress. I ordered a NEW dress and I'm upset. I have to wear the dress today for church. That is very NASTY, to even send me that. Read more
items.author: The dress you sent is totally different from what I ordered and I'm livid. My daughters funeral is Saturday and I need the dress I order for alterations. This is so wrong.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get it girl, get it!
items.body: This dress is everything. The fabric is soft and stretchy, true to size. Love it. I got some many compliment makes me want to wear it everyday. I love that you can wear it with your shoulders out as well. Material is thick.but not to thick. The seams are done perfectly. I may have to get another color or two! Read more
items.author: J. Morgan

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap neckline; tight on tummy
items.body: With this fabric, black is the only option! The hemline of the neck looks like a t-shirt. It is passable for a fun event like a fundraiser. Length was ideal. I am right at 5’8 and could wear flats or a heel with it. I returned it because, while it did fit and even flatter most areas, I do not have a flat enough stomach for it. A flatter tummy than my post-baby-at-35 one is required. Read more
items.author: Will Bailey

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dress fits well
items.body: I went up a size after reading several reviews , dress fits very close would definitely need shape-wear. Material is in between not too thick or thin Read more
items.author: Ricka

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Dress
items.body: This is the best dress for plus size. The material is not thick at all. It’s very comfortable, you can definitely move and dance in it. Read more
items.author: Camay Olison

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Evening Mermaid Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Evening Mermaid Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Navy, Pink, White, Blue, Purple, Burgundy, Black, Teal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
